name: AIA_Extraction_GetSectionPageCount
description: Get page count for a section instance
sail_code:
if(
  or(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!SectionInstance[recordType!AIA Extraction Instance Section.startPage]),
    a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!SectionInstance[recordType!AIA Extraction Instance Section.endPage]),
    ri!SectionInstance[recordType!AIA Extraction Instance Section.endPage] <= 0,
    ri!SectionInstance[recordType!AIA Extraction Instance Section.startPage] <= 0,
    ri!SectionInstance[recordType!AIA Extraction Instance Section.startPage] > ri!SectionInstance[recordType!AIA Extraction Instance Section.endPage],
  ),
  -1,
  ri!SectionInstance[recordType!AIA Extraction Instance Section.endPage] - ri!SectionInstance[recordType!AIA Extraction Instance Section.startPage] + 1
)
